alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 1:14PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Jackson, north central Gulf, Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida and western Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 200 PM EDT/100 PM CDT/... At 114 PM EDT/1214 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles south of Marianna to near Blountstown to near Stonemill Creek. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Stonemill Creek, Wewahitchka, Orange, Bristol, Altha, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Selman, Abe Springs, Vilas, Chipola Cutoff, Jensen Place, Central City, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Camps Head, Red Hill and Clio. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
